AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa: defendant in a case involving illegal re-entry after deportation, sentenced to 90 months of imprisonment, native and citizen of Mexico, signed the Plea Agreement and Plea Agreement Addendum, pleaded guilty before a United States Magistrate Judge, has a history of violating immigration laws, alleges counsel was constitutionally ineffective, claims he was factually innocent of Illegal Re-entry due to potential United States citizenship, waived the right to appeal the sentence imposed and the right to contest his conviction or sentence by means of any post-conviction proceeding
